title: Bug 117981: Unable to Select Items on First Attempt in Library Outline View
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus unexpectedly jumps to the library file node.
EB: Expect the software to allow the selection of items in the library outline view on the first attempt without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item for the first time.
